mapper.sql:
rownum ,deviceType ,sn ,imei ,devEffDate ,devEndDate ,targetNo ,serviceType ,simMobile ,simEffDate ,simEndDate ,uploadDate ,deviceStatus ,userId ,bindDate ,crUser ,crDate ,userstamp ,datestamp from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over (
order by device_type
order by datestamp desc
order by datestamp desc
) rownum,
) as rownumbertable where rownum between (#{begin}+1) and (#{perPage} + #{begin})

device_type as deviceType ,sn as sn ,imei as imei ,dev_eff_date as devEffDate ,dev_end_date as devEndDate ,target_no as targetNo ,service_type as serviceType ,sim_mobile as simMobile ,sim_eff_date as simEffDate ,sim_end_date as simEndDate ,upload_date as uploadDate ,device_status as deviceStatus ,user_id as userId ,bind_date as bindDate ,cr_user as crUser ,cr_date as crDate ,userstamp as userstamp ,datestamp as datestamp

device_type, imei, sn, device_status, user_id, bind_date, dev_eff_date, dev_end_date, target_no, service_type, sim_mobile, sim_eff_date, sim_end_date, upload_date, cr_user, cr_date, userstamp, datestamp
mapper.insert: insert into tb_device (device_type, imei, sn, device_status, user_id, bind_date, dev_eff_date, dev_end_date, target_no, service_type, sim_mobile, sim_eff_date, sim_end_date, upload_date, cr_user, cr_date, userstamp, datestamp ) values (#{deviceType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{imei,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{sn,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{deviceStatus,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{bindDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{devEffDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{devEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{targetNo,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{serviceType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{simMobile,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{simEffDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{simEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{uploadDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{crUser,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{crDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userstamp,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{datestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into tb_device
device_type,
imei,
sn,
device_status,
user_id,
bind_date,
dev_eff_date,
dev_end_date,
target_no,
service_type,

sim_eff_date,

cr_date,
userstamp,
datestamp,

mapper.update:
update tb_device
device_type = #{record.deviceType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
imei = #{record.imei,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
sn = #{record.sn,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
device_status = #{record.deviceStatus,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
bind_date = #{record.bindDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dev_eff_date = #{record.devEffDate,jdbcType=DATE},
dev_end_date = #{record.devEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},
target_no = #{record.targetNo,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
service_type = #{record.serviceType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
sim_mobile = #{record.simMobile,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
sim_eff_date = #{record.simEffDate,jdbcType=DATE},
sim_end_date = #{record.simEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},
upload_date = #{record.uploadDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cr_user = #{record.crUser,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
cr_date = #{record.crDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
userstamp = #{record.userstamp,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
datestamp = #{record.datestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update tb_device set device_type = #{record.deviceType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, imei = #{record.imei,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, sn = #{record.sn,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, device_status = #{record.deviceStatus,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, bind_date = #{record.bindDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dev_eff_date = #{record.devEffDate,jdbcType=DATE}, dev_end_date = #{record.devEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, target_no = #{record.targetNo,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, service_type = #{record.serviceType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, sim_mobile = #{record.simMobile,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, sim_eff_date = #{record.simEffDate,jdbcType=DATE}, sim_end_date = #{record.simEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, upload_date = #{record.uploadDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cr_user = #{record.crUser,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, cr_date = #{record.crDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, userstamp = #{record.userstamp,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, datestamp = #{record.datestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

device_status = #{deviceStatus,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},

dev_eff_date = #{devEffDate,jdbcType=DATE},
dev_end_date = #{devEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},

where device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} and imei = #{imei,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} and sn = #{sn,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}
